entries.title: Canceled Duke Nukem 3D remake is the latest Duke project to leak
entries.description: A playable build of Duke Nukem 3D: Reloaded from 2011 has appeared online.

entries.title: What we want to see from PC gaming hardware in 2023
entries.description: If you put PC Gamer in charge of the world, here's what the next 12 months would look like for our favourite hobby.

entries.title: This is the most demanding PC game in terms of GPU power 'and for a long time it had no graphics'
entries.description: It takes around $150,000 worth of graphics cards to run AI Dungeon's most powerful language model, but you won't need a GPU when it's released on Steam.

entries.title: 2023 will be a make-or-break year for Game Pass
entries.description: The service needs a big year, and some big games, if it's going to shape Microsoft's future.

entries.title: The developers we want to hear from in 2023
entries.description: What mysteries lie in wait for the coming year?

entries.title: Publishers should be thanking modders for making their old games playable
entries.description: Where would Deus Ex be without Kentie's Launcher?

entries.title: Today's Wordle 561 answer and hint for Sunday, January 1
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #561 puzzle.
